title: Juventud La Palma
text:
Juventud La Palma is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, playing in the city of <a href="Huacho">Huacho</a>, <a href="Peru">Peru</a>.
The club was founded on September 7, 1950.
History.
The club was <a href="1978%20Copa%20Per%C3%BA">1978 Copa Perú</a> champion, when defeated Pesca Peru of Mollendo, <a href="Club%20Universidad%20T%C3%A9cnica%20de%20Cajamarca">Universidad Técnica de Cajamarca</a>, <a href="Asociaci%C3%B3n%20Deportiva%20Tarma">Asociación Deportiva Tarma</a>, José Carlos Mariátegui of <a href="Ica%2C%20Peru">Ica</a> and Deportivo Aviación of <a href="Iquitos">Iquitos</a>.
The club have played at the highest level of Peruvian football on seven occasions, from <a href="1979%20Torneo%20Descentralizado">1979 Torneo Descentralizado</a> until <a href="1980%20Torneo%20Descentralizado">1980 Torneo Descentralizado</a>, and <a href="1984%20Torneo%20Descentralizado">1984 Torneo Descentralizado</a> until <a href="1987%20Torneo%20Descentralizado">1987 Torneo Descentralizado</a> when was relegated.
